verses.verse: Now Jericho <WH3405> was straitly <WH5462> shut up <WH5462> because <WH6440> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: none went out <WH3318>, and none came in <WH935>.

And Jehovah <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, See <WH7200>, I have given <WH5414> into thy hand <WH3027> Jericho <WH3405>, and the king <WH4428> thereof <WH1368>, and the mighty men of valor <WH2428>.
And ye shall compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892>, all the men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, going about <WH5362> the city <WH5892> once <WH6471>. Thus shalt thou do <WH6213> six <WH8337> days <WH3117>.

And seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> shall bear <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams <WH3104>' horns before <WH6440> the ark <WH727>: and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> ye shall compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>, and the priests <WH3548> shall blow <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782>.

And it shall be <WH4900>, that, when they make a long blast with the ram <WH3104>'s horn <WH7161>, and when ye hear <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, all the people <WH5971> shall shout <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout <WH7321>; and the wall <WH2346> of the city <WH5892> shall fall down <WH5307> flat <WH8478>, and the people <WH5971> shall go up <WH5927> every man straight before him <WH376>.

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> called <WH7121> the priests <WH3548>, and said <WH559> unto them <WH5375>, Take up the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, and let seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bear <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams <WH3104>' horns before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And they said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Pass on <WH5674>, and compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892>, and let the armed <WH2502> men pass on <WH5674> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And it was so <WH3091>, that, when Joshua had spoken <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, the seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> the seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams <WH3104>' horns before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> passed on <WH5674>, and blew <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782>: and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of Jehovah <WH3068> followed <WH1980> them <WH310>.

And the armed <WH2502> men went <WH1980> before <WH6440> the priests <WH3548> that blew <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782>, and the rearward <WH622> went <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark <WH727>, the priests blowing <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782> as they went <WH1980>.

And Joshua <WH3091> commanded <WH6680> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Ye shall not shout <WH7321>, nor let your voice <WH6963> be heard <WH8085>, neither shall any word <WH1697> proceed <WH3318> out of your mouth <WH6310>, until the day <WH3117> I bid <WH559> you shout <WH7321>; then shall ye shout <WH7321>.

So he caused the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068> to compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892>, going about <WH5362> it once <WH6471>: and they came <WH935> into the camp <WH4264>, and lodged <WH3885> in the camp <WH4264>.
And Joshua <WH3091> rose early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and the priests <WH3548> took up <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> the seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams <WH3104>' horns before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068> went on <WH1980> continually <WH1980>, and blew <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782>: and the armed men <WH2502> went <WH1980> before <WH6440> them <WH622>; and the rearward came <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark <WH727> of Jehovah <WH3068>, the priests blowing <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782> as they went <WH1980>.
And the second <WH8145> day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> once <WH6471>, and returned <WH7725> into the camp <WH4264>: so they did <WH6213> six <WH8337> days <WH3117>.

And it came to pass on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that they rose early <WH7925> at the dawning <WH5927> of the day <WH7837>, and compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> after the same manner <WH4941> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>: only on that day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>.

And it came to pass at the seventh <WH7637> time <WH6471>, when the priests <WH3548> blew <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782>, Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Shout <WH7321>; for Jehovah <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> you the city <WH5892>.

And the city <WH5892> shall be devoted <WH2764>, even it and all that is therein <WH3068>, to Jehovah: only Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> shall live <WH2421>, she and all that are with her in the house <WH1004>, because she hid <WH2244> the messengers <WH4397> that we sent <WH7971>.

But as for you <WH7535>, only keep <WH8104> yourselves from the devoted thing <WH2764>, lest when ye have devoted <WH2763> it <WH3947>, ye take of the devoted thing <WH2764>; so would ye make <WH7760> the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478> accursed <WH2764>, and trouble it <WH5916>.

But all the silver <WH3701>, and gold <WH2091>, and vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and iron <WH1270>, are holy <WH6944> unto Jehovah <WH3068>: they shall come <WH935> into the treasury <WH214> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

So the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321>, and the priests blew <WH8628> the trumpets <WH7782>; and it came to pass <WH5971>, when the people heard <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, that the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout <WH8643>, and the wall <WH2346> fell down flat <WH5307>, so that the people <WH5971> went up <WH5927> into the city <WH5892>, every man <WH376> straight before him <WH3920>, and they took the city <WH5892>.

And they utterly destroyed <WH2763> all that was in the city <WH5892>, both man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, both young <WH5288> and old <WH2205>, and ox <WH7794>, and sheep <WH7716>, and ass <WH2543>, with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>.

And Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the two <WH8147> men <WH582> that had spied out <WH7270> the land <WH776>, Go <WH935> into the harlot <WH2181>'s house <WH1004>, and bring out <WH3318> thence the woman <WH802>, and all that she hath <WH7650>, as ye sware unto her.

And the young men <WH5288> the spies <WH7270> went in <WH935>, and brought out <WH3318> Rahab <WH7343>, and her father <WH1>, and her mother <WH517>, and her brethren <WH251>, and all that she had <WH4940>; all her kindred also they brought out <WH3318>; and they set <WH3240> them without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478>.

And they burnt <WH8313> the city <WH5892> with fire <WH784>, and all that was therein <WH3701>; only the silver, and the gold <WH2091>, and the vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and of iron <WH1270>, they put <WH5414> into the treasury <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of Jehovah <WH3068>.

But Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181>, and her father <WH1>'s household <WH1004>, and all that she had <WH3091>, did Joshua save <WH2421> alive <WH2421>; and she dwelt <WH3427> in <WH7130> the midst of Israel <WH3478> unto this day <WH3117>, because she hid <WH2244> the messengers <WH4397>, whom Joshua <WH3091> sent <WH7971> to spy out <WH7270> Jericho <WH3405>.

And Joshua <WH3091> charged <WH7650> them with an oath at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>, Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068>, that riseth up <WH6965> and buildeth <WH1129> this city <WH5892> Jericho <WH3405>: with the loss of his first-born <WH1060> shall he lay the foundation <WH3245> thereof <WH6810>, and with the loss of his youngest son shall he set up <WH5324> the gates of it <WH1817>.
So Jehovah <WH3068> was with Joshua <WH3091>; and his fame <WH8089> was in all the land <WH776>.
